title: 给玩家添加了essentials中 /craft的使用权限，为什么还是没权限？
author: Dashashou
txt_content: 玩家用chestcommand购买/craft的权限  COMMAND是 console: pex user {player} add essentials.craft   为什么还是没权限？

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
权限是 essentials.workbench
也可以输入 /workbench

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: 改成op:执行的指令再试试

replies.author: MC华夏之魂
replies.txt_content: 使用控制台指令 不要用玩家指令

replies.author: Dashashou
replies.txt_content: 没用..  /craft 的权限好像不是这个？？

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
Dashashou 发表于 2015-9-25 22:25
